Defendant associated with a white Malibu sedan and charged with transporting undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan associated with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR., stopped at the Freer Immigration Checkpoint, also referred to as "a white one", heading towards Highway 59 and then turning southbound onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
Defendant associated with a black Dodge pickup truck and charged with transporting undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck associated with IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., stopped at the Freer Immigration Checkpoint, also referred to as "a black one", heading towards Highway 59 and then turning southbound onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being transported by the defendants, also referred to as undocumented illegals, processed at the Freer Immigration Checkpoint, dropped off between checkpoints to avoid detection
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, attempting to avoid the Hebbronville Checkpoint
